      ChainLink ChainAPI.instanciateChainLink(long linkId)
      This method as the logic to instantiate a chain link class taking the code from the db, compiling it and giving to you an instance of it, if the code is already compiled and the implementation hasn't change in db, it will take it from disk and not re-compile.
      ChainLink ChainAPIImpl.instanciateChainLink(long linkCodeId)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ChainLink> ChainAPI.findAllChainLinks()
      Returns a list of all chain links setup in db and instantiate them
      java.util.List<ChainLink> ChainAPIImpl.findAllChainLinks() 
      java.util.List<ChainLink> ChainAPI.findChainLinksByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
      Finds a list of chain links which properties (title, usage, class name) contains the given keyword Used on the UI to search for specific chain links by it code class name This is a heavy method use it carefully because it needs to compile and instanciate all configured chain links to be able to search on its title, description, etc
      java.util.List<ChainLink> ChainAPIImpl.findChainLinksByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
